channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ CREST, ENSAE on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Improved Algorithms for Contextual Dynamic Pricing
item.description: New algorithms achieve optimal regret bounds for contextual dynamic pricing under minimal assumptions, improving revenue management with better price adjustments.

item.title: Strategic Multi-Armed Bandit Problems Under Debt-Free Reporting
item.description: Incentive-aware algorithm achieves low regret in strategic multi-armed bandits under debt-free reporting, establishing truthful equilibrium among arms.
